admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF023762-TFET - IBRD OPERATING COSTS
            ASSOCIATED WITH THE TRUST FUND FOR EAST TIM,TF040430-EAST TIMOR:  CAPACITY BUILDING,TF027826-TFET - ECONOMIC INSTITUTIONS
            CAPACITY BUILDING PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Economic
            Institutions Capacity Building Project is to assist in
            strengthening the capacity of East Timor in evaluating
            economic options and designing and implementing economic
            policies through the training of key East Timorese staff.
            The project components consist of six courses to be offered
            for Timorese staff coming mainly from the Central Fiscal
            Authority (CFA) and Central Payments Office (CPO):
            Foundations of Applied Economic Analysis parts 1 and 2;
            Public Expenditure Management, Budgetary Processes and
            Project Analysis; Government Accounting Systems; On the Job
            Economic Analysis and Policymaking; and Compilation of Main
            Macroeconomic Aggregates.
